languages.text: "Нет. Но этот раз может стать последним". {n}Голос Паскаля и сам подобен звуку бура — равномерный и спокойный, но готовый в любую секунду взорваться хрустом дробящейся кости и чавканьем рвущейся плоти.{/n} "Я направлюсь в монастырь, потому что должен. Это ясно?"

"No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"
languages.original_text: "Нет. Но этот раз может стать последним". {n}Голос Паскаля и сам подобен звуку бура — равномерный и спокойный, но готовый в любую секунду взорваться хрустом дробящейся кости и чавканьем рвущейся плоти.{/n} "Я направлюсь в монастырь, потому что должен. Это ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "No. But this could become your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

"No. But this could become your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

"No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

"No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

"No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

languages.text: "Nein, aber diese hier könnte die letzte sein." {n}Pasqals Stimme ähnelt dem Geräusch seines Bohrgeräts: unbewegt und ruhig, aber bereit, jederzeit zu explodieren, um Knochen zu durchbohren und Fleisch zu zerfetzen.{/n} "Ich gehe zum Kloster, weil ich muss. Ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein, aber diese hier könnte die letzte sein." {n}Pasqals Stimme ähnelt dem Geräusch seines Bohrgeräts: unbewegt und ruhig, aber bereit, jederzeit zu explodieren, um Knochen zu durchbohren und Fleisch zu zerfetzen.{/n} "Ich gehe zum Kloster, weil ich muss. Ist das klar?"

languages.text: « Non, mais cela pourrait être la dernière. » {n}La voix de Pasqal est pareille au son produit par sa perceuse : calme et régulière, mais prête à exploser sans crier gare, en broyant des os et en faisant gicler de la chair.{/n} « Je me rends au monastère, car je le dois. C'est bien clair ? »
languages.original_text: "No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Non, mais cela pourrait être la dernière. » {n}La voix de Pasqal est pareille au son produit par sa perceuse : calme et régulière, mais prête à exploser sans crier gare, en broyant des os et en faisant gicler de la chair.{/n} « Je me rends au monastère, car je le dois. C'est bien clair ? »

languages.text: “不，但这会是最后一次。”{n}帕斯卡的声音类似于钻头的声音，听起来稳定而平静，但随时准备爆发，届时恐怕会传来骨头的咯吱声与撕裂血肉的声音。{/n}“我要去修道院，因为我必须去。你明白了吗？”
languages.original_text: "No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: “不，但这会是最后一次。”{n}帕斯卡的声音类似于钻头的声音，听起来稳定而平静，但随时准备爆发，届时恐怕会传来骨头的咯吱声与撕裂血肉的声音。{/n}“我要去修道院，因为我必须去。你明白了吗？”

languages.text: 「いいや。しかしこれが最後になるかもしれない」{n}パスカルの声はドリルがたてる音のように力強く淡々としているが、骨の軋みや肉が裂ける音がした瞬間に爆発しそうな勢いだ。{/n}「私は修道院へ行く。それが使命だからだ。わかったか？」
languages.original_text: "No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「いいや。しかしこれが最後になるかもしれない」{n}パスカルの声はドリルがたてる音のように力強く淡々としているが、骨の軋みや肉が裂ける音がした瞬間に爆発しそうな勢いだ。{/n}「私は修道院へ行く。それが使命だからだ。わかったか？」

languages.text: «No, pero podría ser la última». {n}La voz de Pasqal se parece al sonido que produce su implemento de perforación: firme y tranquila, pero lista para explotar en cualquier momento con el crujido de huesos y la trituración de carne desgarrada.{/n} «Me dirijo al monasterio porque es lo que debo hacer. ¿Le queda claro?».
languages.original_text: "No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: «No, pero podría ser la última». {n}La voz de Pasqal se parece al sonido que produce su implemento de perforación: firme y tranquila, pero lista para explotar en cualquier momento con el crujido de huesos y la trituración de carne desgarrada.{/n} «Me dirijo al monasterio porque es lo que debo hacer. ¿Le queda claro?».

languages.text: "Hayır ama sonuncusu olabilir." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, delici aletinin çıkardığı sese benzer: İstikrarlı ve sakin ancak etleri parçalayıp kemikleri kırması an meselesi.{/n} "Manastıra gidiyorum zira mecburum. Yeterince açık ifade edebildim mi?"
languages.original_text: "No. But this could be your last." {n}Pasqal's voice is akin to the sound produced by his drilling implement: steady and calm, but ready to explode at a moment's notice with the crunching of bone and the squelching of tearing flesh.{/n} "I am heading to the monastery because I must. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır ama sonuncusu olabilir." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, delici aletinin çıkardığı sese benzer: İstikrarlı ve sakin ancak etleri parçalayıp kemikleri kırması an meselesi.{/n} "Manastıra gidiyorum zira mecburum. Yeterince açık ifade edebildim mi?"
